metadata.title: CVE-2024-47685 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_reject_ipv6: fix nf_reject_ip6_tcphdr_put()syzbot reported that nf_reject_ip6_tcphdr_put() was possibly sendinggarbage on the four reserved tcp bits (th->res1)Use skb_put_zero() to clear the whole TCP header,as done in nf_reject_ip_tcphdr_put()BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value in
